about.description: Computer Engineering student at VJTI with a passion for Human-Computer Interaction, Reinforcement Learning, and building accessible web applications. Experienced in full-stack development and agent-based simulations.

projects.title: Super MaRLo Bros
projects.description: Developed an RL-based game using PPO algorithm with tailored reward function. Achieved 7/10 successful runs through strategic hyperparameter tuning.
highlights: Implemented PPO algorithm for game AI

projects.title: Virtual Interior Designer
projects.description: Created a web-based design assistant featuring furniture database with web scraping and color palette extraction using K-means clustering.

projects.title: SustainHub - GSoC 2024
projects.description: Agent-based simulation for sustainable open-source communities using reinforcement learning algorithms (MAB, SARSA). Achieved Harmony Index of ~0.8.

experience.title: Google Summer of Code Contributor
experience.description: Developed agent-based simulation for open-source community sustainability using reinforcement learning.

experience.title: Research Assistant
experience.description: Contributing to research in agent-based modeling and reinforcement learning applications.

achievements.title: CodeHunt VJTI - Rank 4
achievements.description: Secured 4th position in college-level coding competition

achievements.title: DATAHACK 3.0 - Top 40
achievements.description: Qualified among top 40 teams out of 300+ participants

achievements.title: ADA LOVELACE - Qualified Round 2
achievements.description: Advanced to second round of national-level coding competition

achievements.title: Performance Medal - Cultural Events
achievements.description: Recognized for outstanding performance in cultural activities

leadership.description: Leading coding community initiatives and mentoring junior students
Managing department operations and coordinating events
